verses.verse: Follow after<WG1377> charity,<WG26> and<WG1161> desire<WG2206> spiritual<WG4152> gifts, but<WG1161> rather<WG3123> that<WG2443> ye may prophesy.<WG4395>

For <WG1063> he that speaketh<WG2980> in an unknown tongue<WG1100> speaketh<WG2980> not<WG3756> unto men,<WG444> but<WG235> unto God:<WG2316> for<WG1063> no man<WG3762> understandeth<WG191> him; howbeit<WG1161> in the spirit<WG4151> he speaketh<WG2980> mysteries.<WG3466>
But <WG1161> he that prophesieth<WG4395> speaketh<WG2980> unto men<WG444> to edification,<WG3619> and<WG2532> exhortation,<WG3874> and<WG2532> comfort.<WG3889>
He that speaketh<WG2980> in an unknown tongue<WG1100> edifieth<WG3618> himself;<WG1438> but<WG1161> he that prophesieth<WG4395> edifieth<WG3618> the church.<WG1577>

I <WG1161> would<WG2309> that ye<WG5209> all<WG3956> spake<WG2980> with tongues,<WG1100> but<WG1161> rather<WG3123> that<WG2443> ye prophesied:<WG4395> for<WG1063> greater<WG3187> is he that prophesieth<WG4395> than<WG2228> he that speaketh,<WG2980> with tongues,<WG1100> except<WG1622> <WG1508> he interpret,<WG1329> that<WG2443> the<WG3588> church<WG1577> may receive<WG2983> edifying.<WG3619>

<WG1161> Now,<WG3570> brethren,<WG80> if<WG1437> I come<WG2064> unto<WG4314> you<WG5209> speaking<WG2980> with tongues,<WG1100> what<WG5101> shall I profit<WG5623> you,<WG5209> except<WG3362> I shall speak<WG2980> to you<WG5213> either<WG2228> by<WG1722> revelation,<WG602> or<WG2228> by<WG1722> knowledge,<WG1108> or<WG2228> by<WG1722> prophesying,<WG4394> or<WG2228> by<WG1722> doctrine?<WG1322>

And even<WG3676> things without life<WG895> giving<WG1325> sound,<WG5456> whether<WG1535> pipe<WG836> or<WG1535> harp,<WG2788> except<WG1437> they give<WG1325> a<WG3361> distinction<WG1293> in the<WG3588> sounds,<WG5353> how<WG4459> shall it be known<WG1097> what is piped<WG832> or<WG2228> harped?<WG2789>
For <WG1063> <WG2532> if<WG1437> the trumpet<WG4536> give<WG1325> an uncertain<WG82> sound,<WG5456> who<WG5101> shall prepare<WG3903> himself to<WG1519> the battle?<WG4171>

So <WG3779> likewise<WG2532> ye,<WG5210> except<WG3362> ye utter<WG1325> by<WG1223> the<WG3588> tongue<WG1100> words<WG3056> easy to be understood,<WG2154> how<WG4459> shall it be known<WG1097> what is spoken?<WG2980> for<WG1063> ye shall speak<WG2071> <WG2980> into<WG1519> the air.<WG109>
There are,<WG2076> it may be,<WG1487> <WG5177> so many<WG5118> kinds<WG1085> of voices<WG5456> in<WG1722> the world,<WG2889> and<WG2532> none<WG3762> of them<WG846> is without signification.<WG880>

Therefore <WG3767> if<WG1437> I know<WG1492> not<WG3361> the<WG3588> meaning<WG1411> of the<WG3588> voice,<WG5456> I shall be<WG2071> unto him that speaketh<WG2980> a barbarian,<WG915> and<WG2532> he that speaketh<WG2980> shall be a barbarian<WG915> unto<WG1722> me.<WG1698>

Even <WG2532> so<WG3779> ye,<WG5210> forasmuch as<WG1893> ye are<WG2075> zealous<WG2207> of spiritual<WG4151> gifts, seek<WG2212> that<WG2443> ye may excel<WG4052> to<WG4314> the<WG3588> edifying<WG3619> of the<WG3588> church.<WG1577>
Wherefore <WG1355> let him that speaketh<WG2980> in an unknown tongue<WG1100> pray<WG4336> that<WG2443> he may interpret.<WG1329>
For <WG1063> if<WG1437> I pray<WG4336> in an unknown tongue,<WG1100> my<WG3450> spirit<WG4151> prayeth,<WG4336> but<WG1161> my<WG3450> understanding<WG3563> is<WG2076> unfruitful.<WG175>

What <WG5101> is<WG2076> it then?<WG3767> I will pray<WG4336> with the<WG3588> spirit,<WG4151> and<WG1161> I will pray<WG4336> with the<WG3588> understanding<WG3563> also:<WG2532> I will sing<WG5567> with the<WG3588> spirit,<WG4151> and<WG1161> I will sing<WG5567> with the<WG3588> understanding<WG3563> also.<WG2532>

Else <WG1893> when<WG1437> thou shalt bless<WG2127> with the<WG3588> spirit,<WG4151> how<WG4459> shall he that occupieth<WG378> the<WG3588> room<WG5117> of the<WG3588> unlearned<WG2399> say<WG2046> Amen<WG281> at<WG1909> thy<WG4674> giving of thanks,<WG2169> seeing<WG1894> he understandeth<WG1492> not<WG3756> what<WG5101> thou sayest?<WG3004>
For <WG1063> thou<WG4771> verily<WG3303> givest thanks<WG2168> well,<WG2573> but<WG235> the<WG3588> other<WG2087> is not<WG3756> edified.<WG3618>
I thank<WG2168> my<WG3450> God,<WG2316> I speak<WG2980> with tongues<WG1100> more<WG3123> than ye<WG5216> all: <WG3956>

Yet <WG235> in<WG1722> the church<WG1577> I had<WG2309> rather speak<WG2980> five<WG4002> words<WG3056> with<WG1223> my<WG3450> understanding,<WG3563> that<WG2443> by my voice I might teach<WG2727> others<WG243> also,<WG2532> than<WG2228> ten thousand<WG3463> words<WG3056> in<WG1722> an unknown tongue.<WG1100>

Brethren, <WG80> be<WG1096> not<WG3361> children<WG3813> in understanding:<WG5424> howbeit<WG235> in malice<WG2549> be ye children,<WG3515> but<WG1161> in understanding<WG5424> be<WG1096> men.<WG5046>

In <WG1722> the<WG3588> law<WG3551> it is written,<WG1125> With<WG1722> men of other tongues<WG2084> and<WG2532> other<WG1722> <WG2087> lips<WG5491> will I speak<WG2980> unto this<WG5129> people;<WG2992> and<WG2532> yet for all that<WG3779> will they not<WG3761> hear<WG1522> me,<WG3450> saith<WG3004> the Lord.<WG2962>

Wherefore <WG5620> tongues<WG1100> are<WG1526> for<WG1519> a sign,<WG4592> not<WG3756> to them that believe,<WG4100> but<WG235> to them that believe not:<WG571> but<WG1161> prophesying<WG4394> serveth not<WG3756> for them that believe not,<WG571> but<WG235> for them which believe.<WG4100>

If <WG1437> therefore<WG3767> the<WG3588> whole<WG3650> church<WG1577> be come together<WG4905> into<WG1909> one place,<WG846> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> speak<WG2980> with tongues,<WG1100> and<WG1161> there come in<WG1525> those that are unlearned,<WG2399> or<WG2228> unbelievers,<WG571> will they not<WG3756> say<WG2046> that<WG3754> ye are mad?<WG3105>

But <WG1161> if<WG1437> all<WG3956> prophesy,<WG4395> and<WG1161> there come in<WG1525> one<WG5100> that believeth not,<WG571> or<WG2228> one unlearned,<WG2399> he is convinced<WG1651> of<WG5259> all,<WG3956> he is judged<WG350> of<WG5259> all: <WG3956>

And <WG2532> thus<WG3779> are the<WG3588> secrets<WG2927> of his<WG848> heart<WG2588> made<WG1096> manifest;<WG5318> and<WG2532> so<WG3779> falling down<WG4098> on<WG1909> his face<WG4383> he will worship<WG4352> God,<WG2316> and report<WG518> that<WG3754> God<WG2316> is<WG2076> in<WG1722> you<WG5213> of a truth.<WG3689>

How <WG5101> is<WG2076> it then,<WG3767> brethren?<WG80> when<WG3752> ye come together,<WG4905> every one<WG1538> of you<WG5216> hath<WG2192> a psalm,<WG5568> hath<WG2192> a doctrine,<WG1322> hath<WG2192> a tongue,<WG1100> hath<WG2192> a revelation,<WG602> hath<WG2192> an interpretation.<WG2058> Let all things<WG3956> be done<WG1096> unto<WG4314> edifying.<WG3619>

If <WG1535> any man<WG5100> speak<WG2980> in an unknown tongue,<WG1100> let it be by<WG2596> two,<WG1417> or<WG2228> at the<WG3588> most<WG4118> by three,<WG5140> and<WG2532> that by<WG303> course;<WG3313> and<WG2532> let one<WG1520> interpret.<WG1329>

But <WG1161> if<WG1437> there be<WG5600> no<WG3361> interpreter,<WG1328> let him keep silence<WG4601> in<WG1722> the church;<WG1577> and<WG1161> let him speak<WG2980> to himself,<WG1438> and<WG2532> to God.<WG2316>
Let <WG1161> the prophets<WG4396> speak<WG2980> two<WG1417> or<WG2228> three,<WG5140> and<WG2532> let the<WG3588> other<WG243> judge.<WG1252>
<WG1161> If<WG1437> any thing be revealed<WG601> to another<WG243> that sitteth by,<WG2521> let the<WG3588> first<WG4413> hold his peace.<WG4601>
For <WG1063> ye may<WG1410> all<WG3956> prophesy<WG4395> one by one,<WG2596> <WG1520> that<WG2443> all<WG3956> may learn,<WG3129> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> may be comforted.<WG3870>
And <WG2532> the spirits<WG4151> of the prophets<WG4396> are subject<WG5293> to the prophets.<WG4396>
For <WG1063> God<WG2316> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> the author of confusion,<WG181> but<WG235> of peace,<WG1515> as<WG5613> in<WG1722> all<WG3956> churches<WG1577> of the<WG3588> saints.<WG40>

Let your<WG5216> women<WG1135> keep silence<WG4601> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> churches:<WG1577> for<WG1063> it is not<WG3756> permitted<WG2010> unto them<WG846> to speak;<WG2980> but<WG235> they are commanded to be under obedience,<WG5293> as<WG2531> also<WG2532> saith<WG3004> the<WG3588> law.<WG3551>

And <WG1161> if<WG1487> they will<WG2309> learn<WG3129> any thing,<WG5100> let them ask<WG1905> their<WG2398> husbands<WG435> at<WG1722> home:<WG3624> for<WG1063> it is<WG2076> a shame<WG149> for women<WG1135> to speak<WG2980> in<WG1722> the church.<WG1577>
What? <WG2228> came<WG1831> the<WG3588> word<WG3056> of God<WG2316> out from<WG575> you?<WG5216> or<WG2228> came<WG2658> it unto<WG1519> you<WG5209> only?<WG3441>

If any man<WG1536> think himself<WG1380> to be<WG1511> a prophet,<WG4396> or<WG2228> spiritual,<WG4152> let him acknowledge<WG1921> that<WG3754> the things that<WG3739> I write<WG1125> unto you<WG5213> are<WG1526> the commandments<WG1785> of the<WG3588> Lord.<WG2962>
But <WG1161> if<WG1487> any man<WG5100> be ignorant,<WG50> let him be ignorant.<WG50>
Wherefore, <WG5620> brethren,<WG80> covet<WG2206> to prophesy,<WG4395> and<WG2532> forbid<WG2967> not<WG3361> to speak<WG2980> with tongues.<WG1100>
Let all things<WG3956> be done<WG1096> decently<WG2156> and<WG2532> in<WG2596> order.<WG5010>
